SplitBill App is designed to revolutionize the payment experience by providing a seamless, flexible solution for group expenses and itemized payments. This Android-based application offers key features that make it ideal for both businesses and customers in various settings, from dining out to shared household costs.
The app offers two main functionalities:

1. Pay by Select Item: Allows users to choose specific items from a shared bill, making it easy to only pay for what they ordered or consumed. This feature is especially useful for group dining, where each person can cover their own expenses without confusion.

2. Split Bill: Users can divide the bill equally or based on item selection, enabling fair and transparent payment distribution among group members. Whether it’s splitting the check or covering shared expenses, SplitBill App simplifies the process.
For businesses, SplitBill App streamlines customer interactions and simplifies payment tracking, allowing seamless bill generation and efficient management of sales.

For customers, the app provides transparency, with self-generated QR codes, easy access to bill history, and PDF receipt generation to keep track of expenses. SplitBill App brings both functionality and convenience, making it a valuable tool for anyone seeking a hassle-free, transparent payment experience.

Welcome to SplitBill App’s Help & Support center! We’re here to ensure you have the best possible experience with our app. If you have any questions or issues, please check the resources below or contact our support team.
- Download & Install: SplitBill App is available on the Google Play Store. Simply download and install to get started.
- Account Setup: Sign up with your email and follow the verification steps to access all features.
- Navigating the App: Our app interface is designed to be intuitive. Use the main menu to access different functions based on your role: Admin, Customer, or Seller.
- Splitting a Bill: Select the \'Split Bill\' option, choose items or enter an equal split, and assign participants for the payment division.
- Pay by Select Item: Tap on ‘Pay by Select Item,’ choose the specific items from the bill, and proceed to payment.
- Generating Receipts: View and download your receipts as PDFs for easy access to your transaction history.
- Login Problems: Ensure your email and password are correct. Use the ‘Forgot Password’ link if needed.
- Payment Issues: Double-check your selected payment method, and make sure you have a stable internet connection. Contact support if issues persist.
- Feature Not Working: Restart the app or check for updates. If the problem continues, reach out to our support team.
4. Contact Us If you need further assistance, don’t hesitate to reach out:
In-App Support: Go to Settings > Help & Support > Contact Us to submit a request directly from the app.
FAQ Section: Browse our Frequently Asked Questions in the Help section for quick solutions to common issues.

5. Feedback and Suggestions We’re always looking to improve! If you have ideas or feedback, please share them with us at feedback@splitbillapp.com. Your input helps us enhance the app and deliver a better experience for all users.
Thank you for choosing SplitBill App! We’re here to help, every step of the way.
